name: Rocky Mountains
description: Experience breathtaking views and stunning wildlife as you hike through the majestic Rocky Mountains.

name: Great Barrier Reef
description: Discover the world's largest coral reef system and observe the vibrant marine life while snorkeling in the Great Barrier Reef.
address: Off the coast of Queensland, Australia

name: Serengeti National Park
description: Embark on an unforgettable safari adventure in the vast plains of the Serengeti and witness the incredible diversity of African wildlife.

name: Grand Canyon
description: Marvel at the awe-inspiring beauty of the Grand Canyon as you explore its intricate rock formations and deep ravines.

name: Eiffel Tower
description: Experience the iconic symbol of Paris and enjoy panoramic views of the city from the top of the Eiffel Tower.
address: Champ de Mars, 5 Avenue Anatole France, 75007 Paris, France

name: Vatican City
description: Immerse yourself in the cultural and historical treasures of Vatican City, including the Vatican Museums, St. Peter's Basilica, and the Sistine Chapel.

name: Colosseum and Roman Forum
description: Step back in time as you explore the ancient ruins of the Colosseum and the Roman Forum, iconic symbols of the ancient Roman civilization.
address: Colosseum: Piazza del Colosseo, 1, 00184 Rome, Italy | Roman Forum: Via della Salara Vecchia, 5/6, 00186 Rome, Italy

name: Louvre Museum
description: Immerse yourself in art and history with a visit to the Louvre Museum, home to an extensive collection of world-famous works of art, including the enigmatic Mona Lisa.
address: Mus√©e du Louvre, Rue de Rivoli, 75001 Paris, France
